description:
Our seasoned litigators at Cohen, Blostein & Ayala, P.A., are aggressive advocates for victims of personal injury and medical malpractice. We have experience on both sides of these cases, as our attorneys have represented health care providers. This gives our law firm a distinctive edge as we fight for maximum compensation in matters that include the following:

  • Medical negligence in pediatrics, cancer, surgery and emergency rooms
  • Birth and brain injuries
  • Treatment delays and prescription errors

Additionally, our comprehensive personal injury practice includes motor vehicle accidents, defective products, wrongful death, elder abuse and aviation liability.

When we say we support the people we represent, we mean it. Starting with a free initial consultation, clients of our law firm receive our undivided attention. Our philosophy is that meeting face to face is the best way to establish an attorney-client relationship that results in success. We have spent decades alongside clients in courtrooms and around negotiating tables.

Our accomplishments amount to millions of dollars returned to clients. Additionally, we have received a number of honors that include holding the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell; being selected for inclusion in The Best Lawyers in America; receiving the America's Top 100 Attorneys' Lifetime Achievement Award; and being named one of Florida's Legal Elite.

Cohen, Blostein & Ayala, P.A., also handles complex commercial litigation services. Our law firm takes cases throughout Broward and Miami-Dade counties, and we offer services in Spanish.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
